version_description:
Now, Suret starts from choosing your favorite category!
Improved smoothly performance.
Improved Arabic language support.
Fixed scroll in Arabic version
Improved smooth animation effects
Added new animations
We make frequent improvements to the app. Update to the latest version to make the most of Suret!
We fixed some users incorrect scrolling
Our app is regularly improved to better connect you with gorgeous Suret.
Thanks for using Suret! Weâ€™ve fixed several image related issues.
Thanks for using Suret! Now you can download our app to iPad.
Minor improvements

We update the Suret app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you.

- Improvements to the wallpapers experience
- Refined user interface
